g.text: 9.1.1. Request Duplicate Check (incl. Transfers, Quotes, Bulk Transfers, Transactions)
Source qualified, each (unique) POST/PUT message is
Request is currently RECEIVED, but we need to verify
by querying db for other records with same UUID.
: uuid uniqueness is not guaranteed across
Store requestStatus and response (not set when GET)
√ request.isFulfil replaces additional lookup or doubling the count of requestTypes
√ request.destination provides for fulfil request validation (destination should match when isFulfil == true)
Unique and regular indexes are used for performance during check, BUT may delay operations
Status update and store response may cost resources, BUT no await or following notification?
Saved response provides processing exactly once, but storage and security may be affected
requestType.methods provide easy configuration for custom processing according to request type
